summary: A shyster with an equally eccentric kung-fu ace of a wife manage to bring justice to the court.
cast: Stephen Chow|Anita Mui|Man-Tat Ng|Carrie Ng|Paul Chun|Ka-Yan Leung|Eddy Ko|Mimi Chu|Kwan-Min Cheng|King-Tan Yuen|Yat-Fei Wong|Wong Chun|Ki Yee Chik|Tian-Lin Wang|Sun Wong|Kan-Wing Tsang|Shing-cheong Li|Wai Ai|Tin Sang Lung|Kai-Keung Sze|Paul Che|Fofo Seung-Ngok Ma|Benjamin Chan|Chi-Ping Chang|Ka-Sang Cheng|Wing Cho|Foo-Wai Lam|Chi-Ming Lau|Chi-Ming Leung|Kai Chi Leung|Hsin Liang|Tai Wo Tang|Hung Wong|Yau Cheung Yeung|Ngai-Ho Yu
title: Sam sei goon
